solution_line_template: Steve needs {num_lengths_4ft} lengths of {length_per_4ft} feet of wood or {num_lengths_4ft} x {length_per_4ft} = <<{num_lengths_4ft}*{length_per_4ft}={total_4ft_wood}>>{total_4ft_wood} feet of wood.

He also needs {num_lengths_2ft} lengths of {length_per_2ft} feet of wood or {num_lengths_2ft} x {length_per_2ft} = <<{num_lengths_2ft}*{length_per_2ft}={total_2ft_wood}>>{total_2ft_wood} feet of wood.
Altogether, Steve needs {total_4ft_wood} feet of wood + {total_2ft_wood} feet of wood = <<{total_4ft_wood}+{total_2ft_wood}={total_wood_needed}>>{total_wood_needed} feet of wood.
